byline: Nova Safo, Bruce Johnson and Matt Novak
title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, January 1, 2014
teaser: It's a new year, and one of the first items on the calendar for the new year is CES - the Consumer Electronics Show, starting next week in Las Vegas. We take a look at what might be top-of-mind among the many technology giants and start-ups in attendance. Plus, we'll talk to Matt Novak, who writes Gizmodo’s Paleofuture blog, to revisit the future that never was in "Back to the Future Part II."
